text: ولا تبخسوا۟ الناس اشياءهم ولا تعثوا۟ فى الارض مفسدين

translations.translation: Do not diminish people's goods and do not go about the earth, corrupting it.
And do not withhold from people what belongs to them, and do not corrupt the land;
and do not deliver short, and do not go about creating mischief in the land,
and do not defraud people in their property or spread evil in the land.
“And do not give the people their goods diminished, and do not roam the earth causing turmoil.”
And defraud not people by reducing their things, nor do evil, making corruption and mischief in the land."
And do not wrong men of their things, and do not act corruptly in the earth, making mischief.
and diminish not the goods of the people, and do not mischief in the earth, working corruption.
Wrong not mankind in their goods, and do not evil, making mischief, in the earth.
do not defraud people of what is rightfully theirs; and do not spread corruption in the land.
And defraud not people of their things, and commit not corruption on the earth.
and do not cheat the people of their goods. Do not act wickedly on the earth, causing corruption.
And withhold not things justly due to men, nor do evil in the land, working mischief.
And defraud not people by reducing their things, nor do evil, making corruption and mischief in the land.
and do not diminish the goods of the people, and do not make mischief in the earth, working corruption.
And do not defraud people of their belongings, and do not work corruption in the land.
And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption.

[26:183] and do not defraud people in their goods, do not diminish anything of what is due to them, and do not be degenerate in the earth, seeking corruption, by killing or otherwise ([ta‘thaw, ‘degenerate’] derives from ‘athiya, meaning afsada, ‘to corrupt’; mufsidīna, ‘seeking corruption’, is a circumstantial qualifier emphasising the import of its operator [ta‘thaw]).

commentaries.author: ابن عباس
commentaries.text: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا النَّاسَ أَشْيَاءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا فِي الْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ (183)، والبخس : النقص والذم . وتقدم في قوله : { ولا يبخس منه شيئاً } في سورة البقرة ( 282 ) ونظيره في سورة الأعراف . وقد تقدم نظير بقية الآية في سورة هود . ومن بخس الأشياء أن يقولوا للذي يعرض سلعة سليمة للبيع : إن سلعتك رديئة ، ليصرف عنها الراغبين فيشتريها برُخص .

translations.translation: (Wrong not mankind in their goods) do not diminish people's due in measurement and weight, (and do not evil, making mischief, in the earth) do not commit transgressions and corruption in the land by giving less in measurement and weight and calling to the worship of other than Allah.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَلاَ تَبْخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ } معناه لا تَنْقُصُوهُمْ

translations.translation: And His saying, "Do not withhold from the people the things they are owed" - its meaning is do not cheat them.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَ } عليكم أيضا أن { لاَ تَبْخَسُواْ } ولا تنقصوا { ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ } ولا تكسروا سلعهم { وَ } بالجملة: { لاَ تَعْثَوْاْ فِي ٱلأَرْضِ } أي: لا تمشوا عليها بالظلم { مُفْسِدِينَ } [الشعراء: 183] بأنواع الفساد


{ وَ } كيف تفسدون فيها
